EventBusName.description: The name or ARN of the event bus associated with the rule. If you omit this, the default event bus is used.
EventBusName.markdownDescription:
The name or ARN of the event bus associated with the rule. If you omit this, the default event bus is used.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Some interruptions

EventPattern.description: The event pattern of the rule. For more information, see Events and Event Patterns in the Amazon EventBridge User Guide.
EventPattern.markdownDescription:
The event pattern of the rule. For more information, see Events and Event Patterns in the Amazon EventBridge User Guide.

---

Required: No  
Type: ['string', 'object']  
Update requires: No interruption

ScheduleExpression.description: The scheduling expression. For example, "cron(0 20 * * ? *)", "rate(5 minutes)". For more information, see Creating an Amazon EventBridge rule that runs on a schedule.
ScheduleExpression.markdownDescription:
The scheduling expression. For example, "cron(0 20 * * ? *)", "rate(5 minutes)". For more information, see Creating an Amazon EventBridge rule that runs on a schedule.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
The description of the rule.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

State.markdownDescription:
The state of the rule.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: DISABLED | ENABLED | ENABLED_WITH_ALL_CLOUDTRAIL_MANAGEMENT_EVENTS  
Update requires: No interruption

Targets.description:
Adds the specified targets to the specified rule, or updates the targets if they are already associated with the rule.
Targets are the resources that are invoked when a rule is triggered.
Targets.markdownDescription:
Adds the specified targets to the specified rule, or updates the targets if they are already associated with the rule.
Targets are the resources that are invoked when a rule is triggered.

Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Update requires: No interruption
